A little disappointed. We had earned enough points to travel to Europe. Before it was 9000/Air Miles points per person to go to Europe. Now it's 1000/Dream points, and $1,700 in taxes  fees for 2 people. Checking the prices with the direct airlines, the total cost is $1,700. By selecting the Air Miles option, we are spending 1000 points with no benefit. Through their app, 1000 points equals $42. On their vacation package, there is a cap on how many Air Miles that you are allowed to use.
